name: chicagotribune
text: Michael Jordan and Jordan Brand, the sneaker company that bears his name and iconic logo, pledged to contribute $100 million to organizations fighting racial and social injustice over the next decade https://t.co/rrgOG5xIAr

name: chicagotribune
text: As elected officials, they called for unity. As black mothers, they spoke about fear. https://t.co/U8uEyPWI6w

name: chicagotribune
text: Two Chicago cops were stripped of their police powers after a woman said officers pulled her from a car by her hair and placed a knee on her neck. https://t.co/2vU6hAH1LI

name: chicagotribune
text: RT @LAURA_N_ROD: Al son de Cielito Lindo, mariachis y danzantes folclóricos de Chicago también se unen al moviendo contra el racismo. // Mariachis and Mexican folkloric dancers gather in solidarity with the Black Lives Matter Movement at Seward Park: https://t.co/lMxeqhSZLo https://t.co/gpiLEX2fip

name: chicagotribune
text:
George Floyd's death happened in the context of racial disparity, writes New York Times columnist David Brooks.

“It’s not an event; it’s just the daily condition of our lives ... The response to this moment will be inadequate if it’s just police reforms.” https://t.co/ymkoAzRVQn

name: chicagotribune
text: Commentary: To my white friends and colleagues, here’s how to be an ally to the black community https://t.co/Xkn4EAJjeM
